name: Notion Student Planner - Light Academia
description: Features:- Organize your college or school life by tracking your schedule, assignments, and study notes- Track your healthy habits and to-do list- Track course progress with 6 aesthetic and unique course pages- Use the study sessions page to focus on learning and making notes, while listening to your favorite musicImportant:Duplicate the template to your Notion workspace to make any changes.Please do not reshare outside Gumroad and do not resell.In case of any questions, feel free to contact me
